uvi.description:
ASoC: SOF: Intel: hda-dai: fix potential locking issue

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.162 by commit e5f8c43c854656897def0161ea09fc29bde33a79. For more details please see the references link.
